snippet.title: The Burst - Official Trailer | Upload VR Showcase Winter 2023
snippet.description: Check out the world and see action-packed gameplay from The Burst in this trailer for the upcoming VR shooter game. In The Burst, play as a spec ops operative to bring down the tyrannical warband leader and her goons. Restore order on a prison planet the best way you can - with violence. The Burst will be available in Q2 2024 on SteamVR and Meta Quest. A demo version for The Burst is available now on Steam.
